content: previous row single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row 2 single_crochet in orange increase in orange 4 single_crochet in orange increase with one in orange and one in yellow 4 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow in the end you will have 36 stitches 5 in yellow 9 in orange 6 in yellow 9 in orange 7 in yellow round 7 the stitch pattern will be 5 single_crochet increase x 6 42 with the following color changes 5 single_crochet in yellow increase with one in yellow and one in orange 5 single_crochet in orange increase in orange 3 single_crochet in orange single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row 3 single_crochet in orange increase in orange 5 single_crochet in orange increase with one in orange and one in yellow 5 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow in the end you will have 42 stitches 6 in yellow 11 in orange 6 in yellow 11 in orange 8 in yellow for the next three row you could carry the yellow yarn all the way but this is a bit wasteful bulky and could have color show through i only carried under the yellow stitches by folding the yarn back on the work making sure it is slack enough i carry it over all the yellow and three orange stitches this helps with gauge issues being too loose at the color change the loop of the previous round can be hidden under these few orange stitches too rounds 8 4 single_crochet in yellow decrease in yellow increase in orange 26 single_crochet in orange increase in orange decrease in yellow 6 in yellow in the end you will have 42 stitches with 12 yellow stitches and 30 orange stitches pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin round 9 & 10 4 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row 30 orange stitches single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row for round 9 the previous stitch was a decrease insert first tilted v 6 single_crochet in yellow 42 round 11 4 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row use a 4 00mm/g6 hook and 30 chain stitches in orange and 1 change stitch in yellow return to using 3 25 mm/ usd3 hook attached to the next yellow stitch 31 stitches from where you started chain stitches technically this should be 30 chains but i find adding a chain makes
